remarks: An isomorphism H value is included in the vector space (expressed as ` T X. E ` ).  (Contributed by NM, 26-Sep-2014.)
statement:
dihssxp.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
dihssxp.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihssxp.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihssxp.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihssxp.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihssxp.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dihssxp.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
dihssxp $p |- ( ph -> ( I ` X ) C_ ( T X. E ) ) $.
